channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for general practitioners a. y. 2024/25
item.description: The Faculty Management Committee has decided to award 1 unpaid teaching contract to General Practitioners for the single-cycle Master's degree programme in Medicine and Surgery in English (International Medical School).%0AHow to apply: Elixform%0ADeadline: 5 December 2024%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Upcoming strike
item.description: On Friday, 28 November there may be service disruptions due to a general strike. However, this will not affect the following services: final exams for Bachelor’s and Master’s degrees, postgraduate schools and PhD programmes, issuing of urgent certificates.%0A

item.title: Extension of Document Submission Deadline
item.description: Please be informed that the deadline for submitting the required documentation for enrolment has been extended to December 31, 2025.%0A

item.title: SLAM webinar “(Non solo) Suno.com: come sfruttare l’IA generativa per scrivere canzoni in classe”, 28 November 2025, at 3:00 p.m
item.description: Registration is now open for the webinar organized by the SLAM University Language Centre “(Non solo) Suno.com: come sfruttare l’IA generativa per scrivere canzoni in classe”, led by Ms. Giuditta Grechi and scheduled for 28 November 2025, at 3:00 p.m.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Important Visa Information for International Applicants
item.description: Some clarifications about the visa process for international applicants%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Open semester: course schedules and attendance
Dual Career programme for student-athletes
item.description: As of 15 July 2025, students can submit their application for the Dual Career programme, aimed at supporting high-level athletes in balancing their competitive sports commitments with university career.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it
